xml.title: Cases of conscience concerning witchcrafts
xml.descri: Manuscript, written in four different hands; "The contents" (p. [5-6]) corrections, and seven of the 14 attestation signatures at end of preface are, according to T.J. Holmes (Increase Mather, a bibliography) in the author's hand. Opening part of the preface is wanting. In portfolio. 23 cm
